header.title: Solmio Ailo®
header.description: Ailo® is a completely new type of assistant for restaurants! You can talk to me about anything, just like to a person 😊

support.title: Solmio Support Service:
support.description: Quickly get support for any issue. I can tell you how to act if you want to create new products or if there are problems with the network.

productInfo.title: Product Information
productInfo.description: I always know the latest information about products and raw materials.

cashReports.title: Cash Reports:
cashReports.description: I can fetch all cash reports for you and compare them as needed.

inventory.title: Inventory:
inventory.description: Real-time inventory balance, always and anywhere.

imageAnalysis.title: Image Analysis:
imageAnalysis.description: You can upload an image of, for example, your restaurant hall, salad bar, or stock, and I can tell if it meets the guidelines.

marketing.title: Marketing and Sales Promotion:
marketing.description: You can ask me for tips to boost sales. I can take seasons and local events into account.
